title: eJay DJ Mixstation 4 Reloaded v1.01.0031-CHAOS [deepstatus]

TURN YOUR PC INTO A DJÃ¢â‚¬â„¢in g PLATFORM!

DJ Mixstation 4 is the latest addition to the acclaimed DJ Mixstation series. It allows you to turn any PC desktop or laptop into a professional DJ Suite. Mix your tracks with ease and play them out to a live audience. Features include Tempo Changer, Pitch Shifter, Auto BPM counter and synchronisation, Crossfader and Effects. Ideal for practicing in your bedroom, mixing at a house party or playing at a full blown live event. Are you ready for your audience?

Mix your songs together and play them to an audience

POWERFUL AUTO BPM SYNCHRONISATION AND BEAT MATCHING
Sync two tracks together automatically and let DJ Mixstation 4 do the mixing for you. Just donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t tell anyone thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s your secret!

SUPPORTING THE STANDARDS
Load any WAV, MP3, FLAC, WMA, OGG Vorbis or Audio CD file into your mix ready to play

VINYL / SCRATCH MODE
Allows you to scratch and stop the track like you would with a normal turntable

WAVEFORM VISUALISATION
See a visual representation of the track you are playing to allow you to more accurately mix

SAVE YOUR MIXES
Record and export your blinding mixes to a file so you can use them at a later date

   System Requirements


Windows XP/Vista/7, 1 GHz processor, 1024 MB RAM, 600 MB free Disk space, DirectX 9.0c compatible audio card



[Installation]

UnRar.

Install ejay_djmixstation4_setup.
( choose german or english lang in setup window )

Don't launch yet.

Copy the content from Patch folder to installation directory
